outputs.output_descr: This Programme intends to support SCTA to discharge its national mandate of boosting the contribution of the tourism and antiquities sector to the economy. The specific outputs of the Programme for 2010-2011 are as follows: 1) Human resource development (HRD) promoted in the tourism and antiquities sector; 2) national capacities developed for greater private investment in the sector, particularly in rural areas for pro-poor economic growth; 3) SCTA marketing efforts technically and operationally supported with focus on public awareness of the socio-economic, cultural and environmental dimensions of tourism and antiquities; and 4) the legal framework streamlined and aligned with the new mandate of SCTA.

project_descr: Umbrella Programme to support tourism and antiquities commission in Saudi Arabia.

subnational.name: Commission for Tourism and Antiquities, Riyadh
